Title: Mina Walking
Actors: Farzana Nawabi, Hashmatullah Fanai, Qadir Aryaie, Marina Golbahari
Plot: 12 year-old Mina cooks, sews, washes and works selling knick-knacks on the war-torn streets of Kabul to feed her neglectful father and senile grandfather. Nobody praises her. She spends her life walking without looking back or stopping.
